channel.title: My 'sprite' sig attempt
channel.description:
hiya guys n girls,
Was just wondering if i could get come constructive critasism on this sig i 'tried to make' its my 3rd attempt in photoshop....i think im getting better?
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img168.imageshack.us/img168/4814/spritesigfd3.png[/img][/URL]
thx for any advice
MuNkY.

item.title: My 'sprite' sig attempt
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“MuNkY, post:3, topic:139026”]ok thankyou my friend, does this look any better?

[/quote]

Don’t make her transparent, that wasn’t the point lol. What I meant was that the outline around her was too defined, if you will, like someone took a sticker and put it on a picture. Try to make the background of it match the color of the dress, but don’t make the background black & white and have aqua, yellow, blue and lavender in the foreground, it just doesn’t match.

I’d make the background the lighter color of the dress/robe, but then again I’m not an expert so don’t kill me :D.

Read full topic

item.description:

the colors dont really mach, red, yellow, blue, cyan and black, and pink. the exclusion thing is nice if everything in the image had the same color stuff, i wont rate cause exe will just flame me…so i wont rate.
-fellixombc

item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Nice, except it kind of looks like someone just stamped her on there or something. Blend her outline a little more with the background, or make it fit in a tiny bit better.
